Article.ArticleTitle: Persistence of a SARS-CoV-2 T-cell response in patients with long COVID and lung sequelae after COVID-19.

Abstract.AbstractText: 1 year after an acute COVID-19 episode, patients with either lung sequelae or long COVID show a stronger SARS-CoV-2-specific T-cell response than fully recovered individuals, suggesting persistent cell stimulation by residual viral reservoirs https://bit.ly/40bPZm7.
